# Problema

>> Descripción del problema a resolver.

## Solución

>> Lista con soluciones implementadas.

- feature 1
- feature 2
- docs
- style decision
- known bugs introduced
- useful commands
- etc...

## Resuelve

>> Palabras claves para resolver issues automáticamente como `resolves #<issue-number>` 

> Esta pull request resolves #1
